remarks: Lemma for ~ bj-inf2vnlem3 and ~ bj-inf2vnlem4 .  Remark: unoptimized proof (have to use more deduction style).  (Contributed by BJ, 8-Dec-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-inf2vnlem2 $p |- ( A. x e. A ( x = (/) \/ E. y e. A x = suc y ) -> ( Ind Z -> A. u ( A. t e. u ( t e. A -> t e. Z ) -> ( u e. A -> u e. Z ) ) ) ) $.
$d A t u x y $.
$d Z t u x y $.
